org.apache.flink.graph.drivers

接口 Driver<K,VV,EV>

  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有超级接口:
    Parameterized
    所有已知实现类:
    AdamicAdar, ClusteringCoefficient, ConnectedComponents, DriverBase, EdgeList, GraphMetrics, HITS, JaccardIndex, PageRank, TriangleListing

    public interface Driver<K,VV,EV>
extends Parameterized
    A driver for one or more GraphAlgorithm and/or GraphAnalytic.

    It is preferable to include multiple, overlapping algorithms/analytics in the same driver both for simplicity and since this examples module demonstrates Flink capabilities rather than absolute performance.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getLongDescription()
      A multi-line description, presented in the algorithm usage.
      java.lang.String getShortDescription()
      A one-line description, presented in the algorithm listing.
      DataSet plan(Graph<K,VV,EV> graph)
      "Run" algorithms and analytics on the input graph.
      void printAnalytics(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Analytic results are summaries so are always printed to the console irrespective of the chosen Output.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.Parameterized

        configure, getName, getUsage

    • 方法详细资料

      • getShortDescription

        java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        A one-line description, presented in the algorithm listing.
        返回:
        short description

      • getLongDescription

        java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        A multi-line description, presented in the algorithm usage.
        返回:
        long description

      • plan

        DataSet plan(Graph<K,VV,EV> graph)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        "Run" algorithms and analytics on the input graph. The execution plan is not finalized here but in the output methods.

        Drivers are first configured, next planned, and finally the chosen output method is called.

        A null value should be returned when the Driver does not execute a GraphAlgorithm but only executes a GraphAnalytic.

        参数:
        graph - input graph
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - on error

      • printAnalytics

        void printAnalytics(java.io.PrintStream out)
        Analytic results are summaries so are always printed to the console irrespective of the chosen Output.
        参数:
        out - output stream for printing results
